author: hwright
msg: Fix Issue 3413: Bindings fail to load FS modules with enabled run-time

author: hwright
msg: Fix Issue 3414: DAV RA layers not properly handling update working copy
dir to revision in which it didn't exist.
Delay beginning the drive of the repos update editor until after some
common error conditions have been tested for.  This helps provide
more user-friendly error messaging for DAV clients.
r37747 adds the test. r37793 is the actual fix.
What part of "user" and "friendly" did you not catch?

author: stsp
msg: * configure.ac: If the check for bindtextdomain() in libintl fails,
try again with -liconv. On some systems, e.g. OpenBSD, libintl
